summary: A down-and-out law student sues Satan for $8 trillion dollars. Satan appears to defend himself and the trial of the century and pleads the fifth. He readily admits that he cannot take on the flesh. Genesis 3:14 confirms this as he is only allowed to eat dust!
cast: Malcolm McDowell|Shannen Fields|Corbin Bernsen|Tom Sizemore|Bart Bronson|Rebecca St. James|Jeff Gannon|Roslyn Gentle|Jennifer Skyler|Chad Lammers|Gabrielle Whittaker|Gemma Kaye|Robin Royce Queree|Dennis Cole|Kenny Epps|Douglas White|Annie Lee|Gregory Caine|Rob Walters|Melissa Hanes|Jessica Saras|Linda Mercorella|Marina Mercorella|Bella Blaikock|Samantha Clarke|Gordon Anderson|Michael Grady|Hannah Forsyth|Denning Isles|Shira Van Essen|Hannah Bath|Jeff Crabtree|Josh Reid|Morgan Roy|Kylie O'Brien|Jessica Kelly|Jayden O'Brien|Clara Tsoukaris|Daniel O'Brien|Shalane Connors|Colin Huxley|Phil Pringle|Peter Rahme|Paul Newsham|Erwan Sirvin|Hiromi Ozaki|Sarah Jane Coombe|Lilly McDowell|Jennifer Alexander|Drew Pearson|Mary Cong|Christian Coronica|Anna Sims|Laura Hughes|Steve Maresca|Abu Bakarr Koroma|Patrick Mooney|Daniel Widdowson|Emma Saad|Charlie Alombert|Melissa Coker|Katie Phillips|Jean-Vincent Canolle|Florian Groc|Bobey Taleb|Lisa Liosatos|Zahra|Stacey|Bailey|Carlos Sivalingam|Ron Cook|Chantal Crawford|Natasha Phewa|Laticha Scott|Ron Barba|Richard Rossi|Sheila Rabizadeh|Bruce Mann|Alex Acosta|Jake Buratti|Lillie Claire|James Harry Knight|Brianna la Rance|Melinda Latsos

title: Suing the Devil
